io.sphere.sdk.annotations

Annotation Type ResourceDraftValue


  • public @interface ResourceDraftValue
    This annotation marks an interface as resource draft representation.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      FactoryMethod[] factoryMethods 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean abstractBuilderClass
      If set to true, the generated builder class will be abstract so that it can be further customized.
      boolean abstractResourceDraftValueClass
      If set to true, the generated resource value class will be abstract so that it can be further customized.
      String[] additionalBuilderInterfaces
      Allows to specify additional interfaces that the generated builder should implement.
      boolean builderReturnsDslClass
      If set to true, the builder will return the concrete implementation.
      CopyFactoryMethod[] copyFactoryMethods 

    • Element Detail

      • factoryMethods

        public abstract FactoryMethod[] factoryMethods

      • copyFactoryMethods

        public abstract CopyFactoryMethod[] copyFactoryMethods
        Default:
        {}

      • builderReturnsDslClass

        public abstract boolean builderReturnsDslClass
        If set to true, the builder will return the concrete implementation. We switched the default to true because our previous generator always returned a concrete type, although the builder type argument T was set to to the draft interface.
        Returns:
        true iff. the generated build method should the concrete implementation type.
        Default:
        true

      • additionalBuilderInterfaces

        public abstract String[] additionalBuilderInterfaces
        Allows to specify additional interfaces that the generated builder should implement.
        Returns:
        list of fully qualified additional builder interface names
        Default:
        {}

      • abstractBuilderClass

        public abstract boolean abstractBuilderClass
        If set to true, the generated builder class will be abstract so that it can be further customized.
        Returns:
        true iff. the generated builder should be abstract
        Default:
        false

      • abstractResourceDraftValueClass

        public abstract boolean abstractResourceDraftValueClass
        If set to true, the generated resource value class will be abstract so that it can be further customized.
        Returns:
        true iff. the generated class should be abstract
        Default:
        false
